content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory has been built yet.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
-  Ensure that the pipe connection points are not occupied by other entities before attempting to connect them.
-  Make sure that the offshore pump and boiler are correctly connected to the pipe network.
-  Verify that the fluid system IDs match for the connected entities.

### Errors when refueling entities
-  Ensure that the entity is out of fuel before attempting to refuel it.
-  Make sure that the fuel is available in the inventory before attempting to refuel an entity.

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure that the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
-  Verify that the entity can be placed at the specified position before attempting to place it.
